body_html: Also, regarding cur_input as an argument to the decoder_fn. The raw_rnn api does not provide a cur_input as an argument to the loop_fn function. But I don't think we need it anyway in the decoder_fn. I will try and code something up.
body_text: Also, regarding cur_input as an argument to the decoder_fn. The raw_rnn api does not provide a cur_input as an argument to the loop_fn function. But I don't think we need it anyway in the decoder_fn. I will try and code something up.
body: Also, regarding `cur_input` as an argument to the `decoder_fn`. The raw_rnn api does not provide a `cur_input` as an argument to the [loop_fn function](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L1106). But I don't think we need it anyway in the decoder_fn. I will try and code something up.
